otherNames: The Strongest Son-in-law's Roaming Journey, The Strongest Prince Consort’s Journey, 最强驸马逍遥游,The most powerful prince-in-law's escape, The Mightiest Horse Lord in Chaos Realms
synopsis: It follows the story of a super scientist who develops a super AI capable of calculating the birth and destruction of the universe. Through a time-traveling journey to a parallel cultivation universe, the protagonist utilizes the AI to gain an overwhelming advantage, easily dealing with cunning and strategic adversaries, ultimately making a comeback in the three realms…
